questions.quote: Maybe. But that doesnt explain why they keep taking my scissors.
Wait. Before we go in, I just want you to know I love you. I had a great time on our honeymoon, and I can't wait to go in there and spend the rest of our life together.
Oh, I figured you guys would all be mad at me. So I got you some gifts that I found on the side of the road. Who wants the teddy bear with one leg?
No, there isn't time to go to the bakery. We're just gonna come home... Everybody left? Alright, well just tell Emma we're gonna be there as soon as we can. Bye...
So, you know I'm filling in for Phoebe's step dad, tomorrow, right?
So, uh, this guy, she used to go out with, is, uh... is he still in love with her?
Yeah, we switched meat suppliers at work, and the new guys gave me the steaks as sort of a thank-you.

Well, I added the 'exactly like me' part... But she said she's looking for someone, and someone is gonna be there tonight.
